main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a bright, silver object moving in the sky over Dayton, Ohio on July 4, 1965.
interesting points: The object was moving from NW to North before disappearing behind buildings., It was observed for about 15 minutes., The object changed size, appearing to shrink before disappearing., The object was silent and emitted a white light., The conclusion reached was that it was a satellite, identified as ECHO I.
